admin-dashboard-service.calculation-info: Below are the most important balance sheet and calculation data for this service, which could be of interest to you.
admin-dashboard-service.ratings-info: Below you can see all likes / dislikes that have been given for this service of each individual user. You will also find the email address of the user who has liked there. You can also contact them if you have any questions about the decision.
admin-dashboard-service.comments-info: Below you will find all comments that have been made for this service. If you would like to reply personally to a comment, you can do so directly below via the email address.
admin-dashboard-service.gallery-info: Here you could upload maximal 10 images for the shop. This is to present your service better in the internet.
admin-dashboard-service.music-info: You can upload a maximum of 5 pieces of MP3 music below. The maximum file size is 15 MB.
